name: Neon Assembly
description:
Submission to GMTK Game Jam 2021 for the theme "Joined Together"

Navigate through the cyberspace, joining salvaged enemy equipment with your ship. Your goal- disassemble the hacker leader.

Good luck, assembler!

EDIT: Killing the hacker leader is bugged- it doesn't properly end the game... But note if you kill it you technically won so woo!
